mapper.select: select pm.place_id, pm.place_name, pm.place_address, pm.benefit_detail, pm.event_msg, (select place_img from place_img_mst where place_id = pm.place_id ORDER by place_seq LIMIT 1) AS place_img, pd.time_room, pd.time_price, pd.availability_time, pd2.day_room, pd2.day_price, pd2.check_in_time from place_mst pm left outer join place_dtl pd on(pd.place_id = pm.place_id AND pd.time_price = (SELECT MIN(time_price) FROM place_dtl WHERE place_id = pm.place_id)) left outer join place_dtl pd2 on(pd2.place_id = pm.place_id AND pd2.day_price = (SELECT MIN(day_price) FROM place_dtl WHERE place_id = pm.place_id)) GROUP BY pm.place_id, pm.place_name, pm.place_address, pm.benefit_detail, pm.event_msg, place_img, pd.time_room, pd.time_price, pd.availability_time, pd2.day_room, pd2.day_price, pd2.check_in_time;

select distinct pm.place_id, pd.place_seq, pm.place_name, pm.place_address, pm.benefit_detail, pm.event_msg, pim.place_img, pd.room_condition_img, pd.room_title, pd.time_room, pd.time_price, pd.dead_line, pd.availability_time, pd.select_time_flag, pd.day_room, pd.day_price, pd.check_in_time, pd.check_out_time, pd.select_day_flag from place_mst pm left outer join place_img_mst pim on(pim.place_id = pm.place_id) left outer join place_dtl pd on(pd.place_id = pm.place_id) where pm.place_id = #{place_id};
mapper.update: update place_mst set place_name = #{place_name}, place_address = #{place_name}, benefit_detail = #{benefit_detail}, event_msg = #{event_msg} where place_id = #{place_id};
